languages.text: Голос Мастера вокса Вигдис Сурри Отта из рода Толиман долго звучал в Просторе Коронус. Эхо его застревало в вокс-диапазоне миров, посещенных Вольным Торговцем, и сводило с ума тех, кому не посчастливилось его услышать. Сквозь безумный смех и горькие рыдания звучало послание: "Валанциус идет".

The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty was long heard in the Koronus Expanse. Its echo embedded itself in the vox-frequencies of the worlds the Rogue Trader visited, driving those who had the misfortune of hearing it mad. Through deranged laughter and wretched weeping, the message could be heard: "Valancius comes."
languages.original_text: Голос Мастера вокса Вигдис Сурри Отта из рода Толиман долго звучал в Просторе Коронус. Эхо его застревало в вокс-диапазоне миров, посещенных Вольным Торговцем, и сводило с ума тех, кому не посчастливилось его услышать. Сквозь безумный смех и горькие рыдания звучало послание: "Валанциус идет".

traits.locale_text: The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty has long resounded in the Koronus Expanse. Its echo embedded itself in the vox frequencies of the worlds visited by the Rogue Trader and drove those, who had aa misfortune to hear it, crazy. Through mad laughter and wretched weeping, one would hear a message: "Valancius is coming".

The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty has long resounded in the Koronus Expanse. Its echo embedded itself in the vox frequencies of the worlds visited by the Rogue Trader and drove those, who had aa misfortune to hear it, crazy. Through mad laughter and wretched weeping, one would hear a message: "Valancius is coming".

The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty was long heard in the Expanse. Its echo embedded itself in the vox frequencies of the worlds the Rogue Trader visited, driving those who had the misfortune of hearing it mad. Through deranged laughter and wretched weeping, the message could be heard: "Valancius is coming."

The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty was long heard in the Expanse. Its echo embedded itself in the vox frequencies of the worlds the Rogue Trader visited, driving those who had the misfortune of hearing it mad. Through deranged laughter and wretched weeping, the message could be heard: "Valancius is coming."

Its echo embedded itself in the vox-frequencies of the worlds the Rogue Trader visited, driving those who had the misfortune of hearing it mad. Through deranged laughter and wretched weeping, the message could be heard: "Valancius comes."

The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty was long heard in the Koronus Expanse. Its echo embedded itself in the vox-frequencies of the worlds the Rogue Trader visited, driving those who had the misfortune of hearing it mad. Through deranged laughter and wretched weeping, the message could be heard: "Valancius comes."

languages.text: 长久以来，托里曼王朝的音阵大师维格迪斯·苏里·欧塔的声音回荡在科罗努斯扩区。在行商浪人造访过的所有世界中，维格迪斯的声音都深深嵌入了当地的音阵通讯频道，所有不幸听到她的声音的人都发了疯。在疯狂的笑声和痛苦的啜泣中，可以听到这样的信息——“瓦兰修斯即将到来。”
languages.original_text: The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty was long heard in the Koronus Expanse. Its echo embedded itself in the vox-frequencies of the worlds the Rogue Trader visited, driving those who had the misfortune of hearing it mad. Through deranged laughter and wretched weeping, the message could be heard: "Valancius comes."

traits.locale_text: 长久以来，托里曼王朝的音阵大师维格迪斯·苏里·欧塔的声音回荡在科罗努斯扩区。在行商浪人造访过的所有世界中，维格迪斯的声音都深深嵌入了当地的音阵通讯频道，所有不幸听到她的声音的人都发了疯。在疯狂的笑声和痛苦的啜泣中，可以听到这样的信息——“瓦兰修斯即将到来。”

languages.text: Die Stimme von Voxmeisterin Vigdis Surri Otta von der Toliman-Dynastie war in der Koronus-Ausdehnung lange zu hören. Ihr Echo ließ sich in den Voxfrequenzen der Welten nieder, die {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} besuchte, und trieb alle in den Wahnsinn, die das Pech hatten, sie zu hören. Durch wahnsinniges Lachen und grauenhaftes Weinen war die Botschaft zu vernehmen: "Valancius kommt."
languages.original_text: The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty was long heard in the Koronus Expanse. Its echo embedded itself in the vox-frequencies of the worlds the Rogue Trader visited, driving those who had the misfortune of hearing it mad. Through deranged laughter and wretched weeping, the message could be heard: "Valancius comes."

traits.locale_text: Die Stimme von Voxmeisterin Vigdis Surri Otta von der Toliman-Dynastie war lange in der Ausdehnung zu hören. Ihr Echo ließ sich in den Voxfrequenzen der Welten nieder, die {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} besuchte, und trieb alle in den Wahnsinn, die das Pech hatten, sie zu hören. Durch wahnsinniges Lachen und grauenhaftes Weinen war die Botschaft zu vernehmen: "Valancius kommt."

languages.text: La voix de la maîtresse-vox Vigdis Surri Otta de la dynastie Toliman résonna pendant bien longtemps à travers les Étendues de Koronus. Son écho s'ancra dans les fréquences-vox des mondes visités par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, rendant fou quiconque avait le malheur de l'entendre. Voici le message que l'on pouvait entendre entre les rires déments et les misérables lamentations : « Valancius approche. »
languages.original_text: The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty was long heard in the Koronus Expanse. Its echo embedded itself in the vox-frequencies of the worlds the Rogue Trader visited, driving those who had the misfortune of hearing it mad. Through deranged laughter and wretched weeping, the message could be heard: "Valancius comes."

traits.locale_text: La voix de la maîtresse-vox Vigdis Surri Otta de la dynastie Toliman résonna pendant bien longtemps à travers les Étendues. Son écho s’ancra dans les fréquences-vox des mondes visités par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, rendant fou quiconque avait le malheur de l'entendre. Voici le message que l’on pouvait entendre entre les rires déments et les misérables lamentations : « Valancius approche. »

languages.text: La voz de la maestra de vocos Vigdis Surri Otta de la dinastía Toliman resonó durante mucho tiempo en la Extensión de Koronus. Su eco se fijó en las frecuencias de los mundos que visitaba {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, haciendo enloquecer a quienes sufrían la desgracia de escucharlo. Incluso entre carcajadas dementes y llantos desesperados, su mensaje se podía oír con claridad: «Valancius se acerca».
languages.original_text: The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty was long heard in the Koronus Expanse. Its echo embedded itself in the vox-frequencies of the worlds the Rogue Trader visited, driving those who had the misfortune of hearing it mad. Through deranged laughter and wretched weeping, the message could be heard: "Valancius comes."

traits.locale_text: La voz de la maestra de vocos Vigdis Surri Otta de la dinastía Toliman resonó durante mucho tiempo en la Extensión. Su eco se fijó en las frecuencias de los mundos que visitaba {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, haciendo enloquecer a quienes sufrían la desgracia de escucharlo. Incluso entre carcajadas dementes y llantos desesperados, su mensaje se podía oír con claridad: «Valancius se acerca».

languages.text: トリマン王朝のヴォクス・マスター、ヴィグディス・スール・アウタの声は、コロヌス・エクスパンスに長く鳴り響いていた。その反響は自由開拓者が訪れた惑星のヴォクス周波数に埋め込まれ、不運にもそれを耳にした人々を狂わせた。狂気の笑いと惨めな泣き声の中、メッセージが聞こえてくる。「ヴァランシウスがやって来る」と。
languages.original_text: The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty was long heard in the Koronus Expanse. Its echo embedded itself in the vox-frequencies of the worlds the Rogue Trader visited, driving those who had the misfortune of hearing it mad. Through deranged laughter and wretched weeping, the message could be heard: "Valancius comes."

traits.locale_text: トリマン王朝のヴォクス・マスター、ヴィグディス・スール・アウタの声は、コロヌス・エクスパンスに長く鳴り響いていた。その反響は自由開拓者が訪れた惑星のヴォクス周波数に埋め込まれ、不運にもそれを耳にした人々を狂わせた。狂気の笑いと惨めな泣き声の中、メッセージが聞こえてくる。「ヴァランシウスがやって来る」と。

languages.text: Toliman hanedanlığından Voks Üstadı Vigdis Surri Otta'nın sesi, Koronus Enginliği'nde uzunca bir süre duyuldu. Yankısı, Hür Tacir'in ziyaret ettiği dünyaların voks frekanslarına entegre edilmişti. Onu duyacak kadar talihsiz olanlar, akıllarını yitiriyordu. Dengesiz kahkahaları ve sefil hıçkırıkları arasından duyulabilen mesaj netti: "Valancius geliyor."
languages.original_text: The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty was long heard in the Koronus Expanse. Its echo embedded itself in the vox-frequencies of the worlds the Rogue Trader visited, driving those who had the misfortune of hearing it mad. Through deranged laughter and wretched weeping, the message could be heard: "Valancius comes."

traits.locale_text: Toliman hanedanlığından Voks Üstadı Vigdis Surri Otta'nın sesi Koronus Enginliği'nde uzunca bir süre duyuldu. Yankısı, Hür Tacir'in ziyaret ettiği dünyaların voks frekanslarının içine entegre olmuştu ve onu duyacak kadar talihsiz olanlar akıllarını yitiriyordu. Dengesiz kahkahalar ve sefil hıçkırıklar arasından duyulabilen mesaj netti: "Valancius geliyor."
